content: i used dk weight acrylic yarn in many different colors but you can choose the kind of dk yarn you like most you can change colors in every round or use just one color there aren t rules i ve used 105 gr - 315 meters 344 yards it s ok to use a worsted yarn too 4 5 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure stitch markers pattern is written in us crochet terms 10 cm x 10 cm/ 4 x 4 = 8 row chain 18 row 1 double_crochet in the second chain from hook double_crochet 17 st row 2 chain 2 turn double_crochet until the end of the row 17 st row 3-8 repeat row 2 until you ll have 8 row 17 st the side of each square measures 15cm 6
